Package Team6.services

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
Team6.services.UserService
public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
Holds details about the usage of user.
Version:
2020.04.24
Author:
Team 6

  • Constructor Details

    • UserService

      public UserService()
      Constructor that creates an instance of UserService, initialising the instance.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      public boolean createUser​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      Creates a user in the database with the given name and password. If the database won't connect, can't get name or password, or execute, a SQLException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      name - The name.
      password - The password.
      Returns:
      True if user is created.

    • hashPassword

      public java.lang.String hashPassword​(java.lang.String password)
      Hashing the password with adding a salt to the given password.
      Parameters:
      password - The password.
      Returns:
      A hashed password.

    • login

      public User login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Returns the user with the given username and password. If the database won't connect, can't get username or password, or execute, a SQLException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      username - The username.
      password - The password.
      Returns:
      The user.

    • deleteUser

      public boolean deleteUser​(User user)
      Delete user with user ID from the given user. If the database won't connect, can't get user ID or execute, a SQLException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      user - The user.
      Returns:
      True if user is deleted.
